data.prayer: Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Manisa.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Manisa, Turkey
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide every search on Google for truth in Manisa, Turkey to find a gospel video.
data.verse: you will seek Me and find Me when you search for Me with all your heart.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 2665 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Manisa, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.prayer: Father, show your mercy on the 1,358,990 people in Manisa who are far from you. Please add 271 new house churches this year.
Father, I pray that the Deaf people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Deaf people know you.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Manisa, Turkey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the state of Manisa that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 1,359,500 citizens of Manisa, Turkey, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

location.name: Manisa
